column5:
We are making big investments to give @GM customers a seamless transition to #EVs, including working to provide access to more than 100,000 charge points throughout the U.S. and Canada. #YahooFinanceAMS22 

https://t.co/wfjkL1ZmTB

These exciting developments represent the power of our technology and our brands, and the opportunities ahead of us. It’s an exciting time for @GM, and I look forward to sharing more at our Investor Day on November 17. https://t.co/q4QeKQKmsB
Our growth strategy is moving forward with major announcements like the launch of GM Energy, and with @Cruise and @BrightDrop driving toward rapid revenue growth. https://t.co/L5khJRi3bP
From the @Chevrolet Equinox EV to the all-electric @Cadillac CELESTIQ, we’re scaling our Ultium-based portfolio to drive volume growth and EV profitability over time. https://t.co/Z9hZNnhtoY

We’re leveraging our decades of truck design, engineering and customer loyalty to #EVs as demand grows for our @Chevrolet Silverado EV, @GMC HUMMER EV Pickup and SUV, and the all-new GMC Sierra EV. https://t.co/OPlAtEyirL

Demand is strong for @GM vehicles.​ The @Chevrolet Bolt EV & EUV’s popularity is soaring, so we’re increasing production next year. They’re affordable, fun to drive, and play an important role in our strategy. https://t.co/9NAVaKGrCf
The @GM team continues to deliver incredible results, and our Q3 earnings report is evidence of that. https://t.co/XOyZGwYPgi
The @GMC Sierra EV is helping drive @GM’s long legacy of truck excellence into an all-electric future. https://t.co/7MhjBGiiXA

The all-new @Cadillac CELESTIQ and @GMC Sierra Denali #EV are the most recent examples of @GM’s strategy to build a full portfolio of incredible #EVs. I'm so proud of the GM team as they deliver on our vision. https://t.co/VrmX52k8wI

The all-new @GMC Sierra EV combines @GM’s truck leadership with everything an EV truck built on our Ultium platform can do – incredible towing capacity, impressive range and more. This is electric truck dominance, delivered. https://t.co/1NMlF84BV3

Hand-crafted. Ultra-luxurious. All-electric. 
The CELESTIQ combines the unique heritage of @Cadillac with our bold vision for the future, and I'm proud to add it to our lineup.
Another game-changing electric truck is on the way.
@helloimseann The Cadillac of Cadillacs. ⚡

A star is born. 

Congratulations to the @Cadillac team for unveiling the all-electric, hand-crafted CELESTIQ in Los Angeles last night.

General Motors is solving today’s challenges and creating tomorrow’s opportunities. Great to be with @serwer to share more about the fantastic @GM EVs on the road and those on the way. #YahooFinanceAMS22
Stay tuned for an electrifying grand entrance. ⚡

So glad to have @Bloomberg’s @MG_Miller explore our Milford Proving Ground & take our upcoming @Chevrolet #SilveradoEV for a test drive. 

Thanks @GM President Mark Reuss for hosting & sharing how we're meeting strong demand as we execute our #EV strategy.
https://t.co/Sc2mlx6tLi

I’ll never forget the first time I drove my @chevrolet Bolt EUV – it felt great. ⚡️

I’m thrilled for more people to experience everything our #EVs offer – they definitely know how to make a first impression. https://t.co/KkGJIwlw8K

I asked people about their first #EV ride – and only 5% answered a rental. This shows the incredible opportunity to create more EV experiences, with @Hertz’s plan to order up to 175,000 @Chevrolet, @Cadillac, @Buick, @GMC & @brightdrop EVs by 2027.

Where will you take yours?

We’re on a mission to create an all-electric future for everyone, everywhere. Now with GM Energy, that includes expanding our flexible Ultium system to offer energy management solutions for homes, businesses and communities. https://t.co/vJB0B7XgjP https://t.co/cGJgKLEMvH
With @GM’s flexible Ultium battery platform at the heart of our #EV lineup, the possibilities are endless.
Our people are our greatest strength, and their hard work is worth celebrating today and every day. Happy #NationalManufacturingDay to our incredible team.
Our team is doing incredible work as we prepare Factory ZERO to ramp up production of the #SilveradoEV.

Replacing Kim is Arden Hoffman, current chief people officer at @Cruise. Arden’s deep background leading HR organizations for fast-growing global tech companies makes her the right leader to deliver our future talent portfolio. Congrats, Arden! https://t.co/0EVp7Wn9FP

We announced Kim Brycz is retiring after nearly 40 years with @GM, on Jan. 1. 

Kim has built a world-class HR organization that has been instrumental to our ongoing transformation. 

Thank you, Kim, and congratulations on your retirement.

All-new soundtracks for our all-electric drives? I like the sound of that. 

Meet some of the @GM engineers composing the new auditory experience for our #EV portfolio – creating sounds as unique as our EVs. https://t.co/F4mYV4WCGo

It’s an honor to be on this year’s Fortune Most Powerful Women list –– an incredible reflection of the purposeful change the @GM team is working to deliver. Thank you @FortuneMPW for including me among many inspiring global leaders creating a better world. https://t.co/0uwDhdZhVJ

I am proud to welcome @jonmcneill, entrepreneur & venture capital investor, to @GM’s Board of Directors. His passion for customers & track record of driving growth in the transportation sector will be an asset to GM as we execute an all-electric future. https://t.co/dkV76lA8Vf https://t.co/YKvpUn5k2A

As September comes to a close, there is lots to celebrate at @GM. These are some of the critical steps we’ve taken this month, and the best is yet to come as we continue toward our #EV future. https://t.co/lGBjymoWMN

Experiencing an electric vehicle is an important piece to driving mass adoption, which is why @GM is thrilled to work with @Hertz to provide 175,000 #EV rental options.  

Where was your first experience in an EV?

From Bolt to Blazer and Silverado to Equinox, I absolutely love seeing @Chevrolet’s #EVs in action. Our EVs are for everyone, and I’m excited to share @GM’s growing, holistic EV fleet with more customers – everywhere. ⚡  
https://t.co/dsux9KvfxH

Functionality. Versatility. Affordability.  
 
Just a few things I love about the all-new @Chevrolet #EquinoxEV. Here’s a look at how we’re welcoming drivers across the largest segment in the industry into the all-electric future. https://t.co/6BvWW4ycTN
Cruise is adorable – I hope @poppytheav isn't too jealous.
@GM One more clue: @GM customers have already driven more than 34 million miles with this technology engaged – and counting.

.@GM has a long history of top customer loyalty, and we’re proud to offer an #EV portfolio that includes affordable options like the @Chevrolet #EquinoxEV. I shared with @IgnatiusPost how we’re delivering on our promise to provide EVs across price points & segments.

@PostLive https://t.co/JTzuFbIDre

The Motor City was electric with #EVs from every @GM vehicle brand on display at @NAIASDetroit. ⚡️  

📍 #DetroitAutoShow2022 https://t.co/mKcFMmzfg1
A significant investment in an incredible team and community. I’m very proud of this step in @GM’s long-term EV strategy.

It was a pleasure joining @Hertz CEO, Stephen Scherr on @CNBCClosingBell to announce our collaboration to put @Chevrolet, @GMC, @Cadillac & @Buick #EVs in the hands of more drivers. I can’t wait to see how much fun Hertz customers have driving our EVs.

To experience an EV is to love an EV. I’m excited to share @GM and @Hertz are driving a major #EV expansion, in which Hertz plans to order up to 175,000 GM EVs, which could support customers traveling more than 8 billion EV miles. https://t.co/GGsZif6Jkd https://t.co/9VbxYpbxtP

This is incredible news for @BrightDrop as they expand their business and product portfolio into the rapidly growing online grocery industry. 

With @Kroger on board as the first eCart customer, I'm excited for BrightDrop to continue growing our all-electric future. 👏

Charging infrastructure is an essential part of putting everyone in an EV. Working alongside @PilotFlyingJ and @evgonetwork, we’re on the way to creating a seamless charging experience across the country. https://t.co/0vUiYxJR6m

It’s electrifying to see our #EVs take center-stage at @NAIASDetroit.  ⚡ 

Special thanks to Mariana Sierra, @GM Innovation Lead Engineer, for capturing these stunning EVs. https://t.co/g0I6JKiMSv

From affordable to luxury to supertruck EVs, @GM is executing our rapid #EV launch cycle and making significant strides with our industry-leading #AV technology.   

Thanks to @IgnatiusPost for the opportunity to discuss all this and more on @PostLive yesterday.
@MissGoElectric @chevrolet @NAIASDetroit @GM The @Chevrolet #EquinoxEV is a game changer, and trust me – we plan to scale.
What makes the @Chevrolet Equinox #EV reveal so exciting? No one to better discuss all things Equinox than executive chief engineer, Doug Houlihan. https://t.co/FhDKCP0kH4

I love my #GMCHummerEV and #BoltEUV, and I know we must provide an #EV option that every driver can love to deliver the all-electric future. The all-new @Chevrolet #EquinoxEV is the next addition to @GM's growing portfolio. 

Thanks for a great discussion, @DavidWestin.

Revealing the @Chevrolet #EquinoxEV in NYC last week was a significant moment for @GM as we aim to provide an #EV for everyone. Thanks @CBSMornings for allowing us to share how this all-new, affordable EV further enables GM to deliver on this goal. https://t.co/3m2w8AlKfs

The @Chevrolet #EquinoxEV is a critical part of GM’s comprehensive #EV strategy. Personally, I know that having multiple options from @GM allows customers to choose a vehicle that meets their needs. Proud to add this great EV to our fleet. https://t.co/FWpbI3ErBE

On behalf of @GM, I extend our heartfelt condolences to the British Royal Family and the people of the United Kingdom upon the loss of Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II. Her leadership, grace, and devotion to service touched the lives of millions. She will be greatly missed.

The all-new #EquinoxEV is truly an EV for everyone – versatile, great range and expressive design in an affordable package.  

And, it looks even better in person. 🙌

So proud to offer even more customers the opportunity to have an amazing @GM EV. https://t.co/O2UDHpfCvS

The best of both worlds: some of @Chevrolet’s most popular nameplates – electrified. ⚡️ 
#BlazerEV #EquinoxEV #SilveradoEV

📍A stunning trifecta in NYC https://t.co/EvSS72xuR9

🌓 The all-new, all-electric @Chevrolet Equinox EV has entered the lineup. ⚡️ 

Thrilled to introduce the newest addition to @GM’s growing #EV portfolio on @CBSMornings. https://t.co/OMHcKhEwJz https://t.co/EcSabqRxGd
Drumroll please…🥁
Tomorrow is a big day for @GM. Looking forward to sitting down with @GayleKing, @TonyDokoupil & @vladduthiersCBS to share some exciting GM product news on @CBSMornings.
Incredible is an understatement. So proud to see our amazing manufacturing team spotlighted.
All things electric vehicles – on your time. Get real-time answers to your questions about the #EV experience in @GM’s EV Live video tours: https://t.co/jCSrmuEPsO https://t.co/7XVcclp6Sf

Our #EVs have been on the road this summer as a starring attraction at @GM facility Family Day events. So glad our teams and communities can experience these fantastic vehicles. #GMCHummerEV #BoltEV @MFG_GM https://t.co/xCQMs2D20h

The work underway at @GM and @Cruise is both exciting and impactful. Thanks to @GM President Mark Reuss for sharing this look into our comprehensive #EV and #AV strategy.

https://t.co/fXDjOVo3k1

The @Chevrolet #BlazerEV delivers exactly what #EV customers are looking for, from design to performance. Listen to our team share the inspiration behind their work on this all-electric SUV and how it came to life: https://t.co/oiQj6BV7u4
The people powering @GM’s future are agile, creative and enthusiastic. Here’s a look at how our team is delivering great #EVs as our portfolio continues to grow: https://t.co/VOcxWmt3ly

With @Cruise, the #AV future is here and now. I love to hear people share their experience and confidence in these driverless rides. @LizClaman @FoxBusiness 

https://t.co/QP0LELoSwf

Scaling EV production. Securing our supply chain. A full portfolio of #EVs. 

GM’s EV strategy is strong, and I appreciate the opportunity to share our progress with @LizClaman and @FoxBusiness. https://t.co/nCgVz4JBMj
It was a great day in New York City sharing more about how we are delivering on @GM’s #EV strategy. Thanks for the great discussion, @LizClaman. https://t.co/4B1BM8b0AF
Congratulations, Hanaan and Jeff. Well-deserved recognition of the incredible work you and the @GM team do to advance our #EV and #AV future.

Electrifying elegance.

📍Monterey Car Week https://t.co/7aB6y74KwO

With these accomplishments, we are making our #EV and #AV vision real by unleashing what the GM team does best: tackling big things with urgency and focus, building outstanding vehicles, and keeping the customer at the center of everything we do. https://t.co/ZKVAi4BlXw

✅Delivering on our word to help accelerate #EV adoption. In addition to launching EV Live to help educate customers on all things #EVs, we’re creating a coast-to-coast network of EV charging stations to help make the shift to EVs work for everyone. https://t.co/Km3KM0yT8Z
✅Securing our all-electric future. From our battery supply chain to our manufacturing facilities, our strategic investments position us to deliver on our commitments. https://t.co/f7fKlQ6Wwv
See you there. ⚡

✅Making #AV and handsfree driving a reality today. @Cruise went commercial, becoming the first and only company to offer a driverless ridehail service in a major U.S. city. I even had my first driverless ride this year and loved it. https://t.co/39SybWvXnw

✅Rolling out a robust portfolio of exciting and stylish #EVs that meet the needs of every customer. @Chevrolet, @Cadillac, @Buick and @GMC are all-in on EVs. This holistic approach plays a deliberate role in our strategy for an all-electric future. https://t.co/CNnaAPxxDa

Today we welcomed Joanne Crevoiserat, CEO of Tapestry, to @GM’s Board of Directors. Her customer-centered, data-driven approach to growth will be invaluable as we continue to accelerate our transformation. https://t.co/23YNQQcGGE https://t.co/eI0oYEFaev
Across @GM, we’re executing our #EV and #AV strategy. I am proud to share some important milestones from this year as our team drives our vision forward. https://t.co/ZKVAi4BlXw
The @GMC HUMMER #EV represents what’s possible in an all-electric future. I’m so glad @LizClaman could experience everything this supertruck has to offer. https://t.co/t8qL6j77cy @FoxBusiness

.@GM applauds all who worked tirelessly on the bipartisan CHIPS and Science Act and we celebrate its enactment into law. This is a critical step to ensure the U.S. can maintain and enhance its place as the leader in automotive innovation.
Excited to have our #EVs on display in New York City today with our team at the J.P. Morgan Conference. #GMCHummerEV https://t.co/ZvHXOrsfWx
@Brett_Berk @Cadillac Thanks for sharing, Brett. I love seeing the excitement people have after experiencing Super Cruise.
A great way to learn more about the #EV experience and how to navigate the world of #EVs with confidence.
@Benioff @GM Thank you, Marc. The #GMCHummerEV really is an electrifying supertruck.
Each of @GM’s vehicle brands are offering stunning #EVs that suit every lifestyle – and this is just the beginning.
Picture perfect in every way. ⚡️

At @GM, we’re making the #AV future a reality right now and putting safety at the forefront of our driver assistance and autonomous technologies. GM President Mark Reuss shares more about our approach to generate consumer excitement that’s built on trust: https://t.co/qtcCsXxIcA
We’re demonstrating how collaborating with the public sector supports safer roadways and communities. Safety remains core to everything we do at @GM as we deliver the all-electric future.
@Sephie___ @GM What an incredible road trip! Thanks for sharing all the places you visited. #BoltEV

Our software updates allow #EVs like the @GMC HUMMER Pickup to enhance the driving experience over time. Another example of how @GM is creating a more seamless, engaging all-electric future for our customers.👏⚡
@TheAshLo @GM @Automotive_News A well-deserved award, Ashley. Congrats again!

Just in time for #NationalInternDay, I had the opportunity to talk with @GM’s global interns this week. Thanks to Alex Segura for moderating a thoughtful, engaging discussion about careers, leadership, and embracing our “Be Inclusive” behavior that is core to GM. https://t.co/ijQFWHLbil

At @GM, “Be Inclusive” is one of our behaviors that all employees live by. Many thanks to GM’s Chief DEI Officer, Telva McGruder, for sharing her perspectives with @BusinessInsider as we deliver #EVs for everyone.

ICYMI: We’ve done something unique in the industry. @GM is securing ALL battery raw material to support our goal for 1 million units of annual EV capacity in North America in 2025. More on what this milestone means for securing our #EV future: https://t.co/m3qRgXeT78
The @GM team is rising to meet today’s challenges. And we are adapting, changing and innovating to execute our all-electric future. Thanks for all your hard work. 👏 https://t.co/E63x2covwq

We’re strategically building an EV portfolio in the luxury, SUV and truck segments. @Cadillac delivered the first #LYRIQ to customers, @Chevrolet just revealed the Blazer EV and the Equinox EV reveal is coming soon.
We're building a strong foundation for EV growth. @GM has binding agreements securing all battery raw material to support our goal for 1 million units of annual EV capacity in North America in 2025.
I’m proud of the @GM team for executing well in Q2 and moving us forward to meet our full-year guidance.
Hand built, ultra-luxury. @Cadillac’s flagship sedan, #CELESTIQ EV.⚡

Congratulations to the @OnStar team on their new look and expanded services that usher in the next era for the business. From phones to motorcycles to homes – OnStar is helping people feel safe wherever they are.

I’m proud of @GM for earning a 100% score on @DisabilityIN’s Disability Equality Index for the sixth consecutive year. Thanks to the entire team for making GM a #BestPlaceToWork for disability inclusion.
@GM Hint: It powers everything from the @Cadillac LYRIQ to the @BrightDrop Zevo 600.
I am confident in our #EV strategy and our ability to deliver electric vehicles that meet the needs of every customer. Thank you @tkrisher and @AP for the in-depth discussion.
👀 https://t.co/1f8WAZnGuR
@jimcramer Appreciate your POV, Jim. Thanks for the great discussion.
Looking forward to further discussing this great news tonight with @jimcramer on @MadMoneyOnCNBC. https://t.co/NKE1PdyfZI
We’re delivering on our word to help ensure #EV charging infrastructure is in place for everyone. I look forward to more people seeing how simple and fast charging can be. https://t.co/KqOs1u8Ame

Accessible #EV charging is so important to the all-electric future, and we're excited to add this collaboration as part of @GM’s nearly $750M investment to expand home, workplace and public #charging.
The partnership will leverage @GM’s Ultium 360 chargers, providing benefits and convenience for GM #EV owners while also being open to all EV brands.
With travel centers across North America, @PilotFlyingJ is an ideal collaborator to bring DC fast charging to #EV drivers everywhere, and notably in rural and underserved areas.
Today, we’re proud to announce we’re working with @PilotFlyingJ and @evgonetwork to expand #EV fast charging stations across the country.
Incoming: coast-to-coast #EV fast charging that will be a game-changer for drivers, fleets, road trips and quick trips.

Can’t get enough of the exceptional, ultra-luxury @Cadillac CELESTIQ #EV. Another look at how this show car will set new standards – inside and out. 

https://t.co/O2JuW81zq6 https://t.co/7Cg3Q25st0
I’m so proud to see the breadth of our high-quality #EVs coming to life. At @GM, we’re charging toward the all-electric future and delivering the best #EVs for every customer.
⚡️The electrified @Chevrolet Corvette. A timeless classic that is sure to be an electrifying new favorite. https://t.co/wQV7bkyWgd
⚡️The @Chevrolet Bolt. Efficient, high-tech, strong performance – and it’s a blast to drive. https://t.co/Je9Rn3UT5v
⚡️ @BrightDrop delivery #EVs. Catalysts for sustainable, streamlined deliveries that transcend industries. https://t.co/UkBVuyidW2
⚡️The @Chevrolet Equinox. A stunning, high-volume vehicle that will open the door to #EV ownership across lifestyles and price points. https://t.co/VkGlTw4ftd
⚡️The @Buick Wildcat #EV concept. A gorgeous glimpse into the brand’s future fully-electric lineup. https://t.co/RLiWvedwbQ
⚡️The @Chevrolet Silverado #EV. The gold standard for all-electric pickups – built for your farm, fleet, or next family function. https://t.co/6JcC7gQv5d
All @GM vehicle brands. All-electric commitments. Buckle up – here’s some of our growing #EV portfolio in action.
Music to my ears. 🎶⚡
✏️🗓 Keep your calendars marked for next Monday, July 18. We’re getting ready to blaze new roads.

A beautiful view from our team at the recent @Cadillac LYRIQ #EV media drive. The sunset is nice, too. 😉

📍 Park City, Utah https://t.co/sz3tZkWXbZ
.@BrightDrop is expanding what’s possible with #EVs - and helping deliver a more sustainable future.
Nothing short of show stopping. 👏🏼
Your #EV questions, answered. Our expert team shares how @GM is making the EV future real, today.

Spotted – a @Chevrolet Silverado #EV being put through its paces at the @GM Milford Proving Ground. Looking forward to seeing your photos of these trucks in the wild when they start testing on Detroit streets next month! https://t.co/AUJRcmmXoY
Quality is central to everything we do at @GM. Thank you to our team for making these moments possible. 👏

It’s so fitting that on #IWED2022, we’re celebrating the tremendous accomplishments of Dr. Mei Cai. @GM innovators like Dr. Cai are showing what's possible with great technology and shared purpose. Congrats, Mei!
'@Cruise' is quickly becoming synonymous with 'first' – another great #AV milestone for the team.

In a word, mesmerizing. Here’s the latest preview of the all-electric @Cadillac CELESTIQ show car. 🤩  
https://t.co/9CbANk8GdF https://t.co/muid31o2Jo
Electric delivery, delivered. Congratulations to @BrightDrop and @FedEx on making history with one of the largest electric delivery fleets to date. 👏
@SirShadowtrap “Started” is relative… now we’re on a roll – and multiplying. 😉⚡
https://t.co/csBNRD6QA2
The @GMC HUMMER EV Pickup looks good in NYC 🤩🤩 https://t.co/Pgp0tzfDvI
A one-of-a-kind team hand-building a one-of-a-kind #EV. The @Cadillac CELESTIQ sets a new standard for ultra-luxury EVs.
The @GMC HUMMER #EV is a true supertruck – and it’s a blast to drive.
Whether it’s here on earth, or on the moon, this is the type of innovation that makes working at @GM so exciting. Thanks for sharing, Bobby!

Big things are happening at @GM’s Factory ZERO! Take a look inside with our EVP of Global Manufacturing & Sustainability and meet the team building incredible electric vehicles like the @GMC HUMMER EV and the @Chevrolet Silverado #EV. 
https://t.co/TTcOiJrxXj

Allow me to share a sneak peek at the all-new @Chevrolet Blazer #EV. 🤩 

I can’t wait until July 18, when we share the details with the world. https://t.co/FIPE2SRVyg
@SecBlinken @GM @Google @amazon So glad we were able to show you the @Cruise Origin. It will take collective action to deliver a cleaner, safer future for all, and we are committed to doing our part.
🤯 is right!

At over one million square feet, we believe this will be the largest automotive design center in the world. 

I'm so pleased to see the team’s rapid progress as we continue delivering beautifully designed and executed #EVs that customers love. https://t.co/6eqxGPFYaX

Already, the majority of incoming projects to the Design Center are #EVs. We are also providing more room for advanced design, industrial design and other teams driving the growth of our technology platforms. https://t.co/Zoyyr7su51
We’re investing in world-class facilities that enable our teams to do their best work executing our electric vehicles. https://t.co/l6hL9DfAv7

Iconic EVs deserve an iconic design facility. Our team took the first behind-the-scenes look at the vast expansion of our Design Center, which will be home to new @Chevrolet, @Buick, @GMC and @Cadillac studios before the end of 2023. https://t.co/raIBxm99kc
@Johnubacon @freep @GM It’s a great read, and a great message – empowering your team is the best path to success.
@GinniRometty Having purpose is so important – in everything we do. Thanks for sharing these inspiring words, Ginni.
Great team, great win! 👏
I'm proud of the @BrightDrop team for helping redefine the delivery industry. Keep up the great work! https://t.co/UgzazWfET6

.@BrightDrop is on a roll! It’s great to see the all-electric Zevo 600 delivery van cruising through San Francisco. These purpose-built #EVs are helping create a more sustainable world. https://t.co/K9ZqOtND7M
Congrats to @12WillPower, @Team_Penske and @TeamChevy!  100th victory for @chevrolet!  Looking forward to the race returning to the streets of Detroit next year!

Mark Reuss' passion for GM and its success is rivaled only by his love of Detroit and Michigan. We are all better because of his vision and advocacy, and I am so glad to see @detroitnews recognize his efforts.
Landmark indeed.

@jlareauan @GM @freep @freepautos @GMdudeinNA @UAW @UniforTheUnion @jimfarley98 I am proud of how we are reinventing @GM and more confident than ever about what’s ahead. Thanks @jlareauan for talking with me about how we are making it happen.
I’ve been driving one lately – I agree!
Today @Cruise is officially going commercial in San Francisco. What a huge milestone for #AV technology that will improve life in our cities – congrats to the entire team! https://t.co/39SybWvXnw

Factory ZERO is just one example of the @GM manufacturing teams who are building great #EVs in the U.S. Proud to see them spotlighted here, and of all the GM team members who are bringing our all-electric future to life.

A sharp look at our plan to put millions of #EVs on the road by 2030. The battle for talent is real. But when we hire, I see people who want to work for a company that’s going to change the world. Thanks @jaclyntrop for this glimpse into @GM's bold future. https://t.co/JMpXv0k6gz

New #EV concept. New brand identity. 
This is just a glimpse at the future of @Buick and its commitment to a fully-electric lineup by 2030.
This is the all-new @Buick Wildcat EV Concept. 👏 @GM’s plans for an all-electric future continue to unfold and electrify. ⚡ https://t.co/XLjtnRPmuq

I fondly recall many memories from my family’s kitchen table growing up. It was an honor to share lessons I learned at that table with @DukeU in this video. 

I encourage everyone, no matter where you are: find your people and create your kitchen table. https://t.co/gNj852JMcE

Marcos Purty rejoins @GM from Amazon, effective June 1. He previously spent 25 years at GM, and his global and external experience uniquely positions him to continue transforming our safety culture. Welcome back and congrats, Marcos! https://t.co/jwEMJDzJyN https://t.co/HVt3KIrgOp

After 40 years with @GM, Jim Glynn, VP of Global Workplace Safety, is retiring. His leadership took safety to a whole new level – creating a company-wide safety culture. I am grateful for Jim's friendship and his genuine passion for people. Wishing him the best in his retirement. https://t.co/tc2Qwq0YhL
Simple as that.

.@GM employees like Candace are our biggest strength. Their skills, talents and passion allow us to move faster than ever toward our vision for an all-electric future, and I’m inspired by them every day.

All smiles meeting with our Fleet teams and customers. @GMFleet is a critical part of our #EV future as we deliver on rising demand for sustainable e-commerce. Thanks for having me, @EdPeper. https://t.co/Ar9XtAm9Qs

Did someone say #EV road trip? The all-electric @Cadillac LYRIQ has incredible range, fast charging, and is an all-around high-performance luxury experience.

Great talking with @SquawkCNBC about how @GM is accelerating #EV production and the major steps @Cruise is taking to commercialize #AVs. Thanks for having me, @Lebeaucarnews.

Our goals to eliminate emissions from light duty vehicles by 2035 and achieve carbon neutrality by 2040 in our products and operations are taking shape. 

The @GM team is united around our vision and executes against it every day.

We are also making rapid progress at @Cruise. Seeing people experience Cruise's #AV technology reaffirms the team's remarkable work and dedication. Their self-driving fleet has driven 40 times the distance between San Francisco and New York City.

Another area we are building a competitive advantage is in affordable EVs. With a starting price around $30K MSRP, the @Chevrolet Equinox EV launching mid-2023 is a true white space opportunity for us since most “affordable” EVs from Chevy’s competitors start at $40K or more.

You will see many of the @GMC HUMMER EV Pickup’s best attributes available in the upcoming @Chevrolet Silverado EV, including superior range, faster fast-charging capability, four-wheel steering and Super Cruise.

Our drive to produce 400,000 EVs in North America over the course of 2022 and 2023 is underway. @Chevrolet, @GMC, and @Cadillac will launch a total of six Ultium-based EVs in 2022 and 2023, including the Cadillac LYRIQ and Chevrolet Silverado EV.
I’m proud of the @GM team for delivering strong Q1 results, launching #EVs and making significant strides in #AV technology.
Leveraging the strength of @GM’s Ultium electric vehicle platform, the #SilveradoEV is the gold standard for all-electric pickups, reimagining what a truck can be.

The Ultium energy recovery system is another example of what’s possible with @GM’s dedicated, ground-up #EV platform. Ultium is the foundation of our EV strategy, and it creates profound benefits for our EV customers.

This collaboration is a perfect example of how our vision of creating an all-electric future for everyone is leading us to leverage GM’s amazing technology, like Ultium, to make an even bigger impact.
Together, we are working to enable global production of millions of EVs starting in 2027 – beyond GM’s current global capacity target of 2 million EVs by 2025.

The newest @GM + @Honda project will share our best technology, design, and sourcing strategies to deliver affordable & desirable #EVs globally. We’re targeting the world’s most popular vehicle segments, including key markets in North America, South America and China.
